summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the reassessment and reassessment roll of Local Improvement District No. , for the improvement of Holgate Street and Holgate Street produced, from Colorado Street to 9th Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway therein 24 feet in width, as provided by Ordinance No. 11946, under Ordinance No. 32905 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
